review: For speed this is great - best streaming stick hardware out there.  I got this for $20 from a pre-launch promotion - didn't really need it but for $20 I was curious.The feel of the equipment is the best of the three dedicated streamers I have tried and actively used - Roku, Apple and now this.I have installed this on a basement HD projector, and it works great.  I like the Roku stick ( I prefer the seasonal aesthetics of Roku), but this is a faster piece of hardware, leading to a smoother browsing experience.The controller has a much better feel than the Apple controller (I've had 3 Apple controllers die on me over 3 years - like a lot of Apple stuff, pretty but not really built to last).  This will also run PLEX, which is a big deal for those with their own movie and video files on a home computer or server, which Roku also does, but Apple does not.
